review: I would like to extend a sincere thanks to Dr Balbir Singh and team Max institute Saket for all the hard work, effort, and exceptional skills that you deployed in implanting right side AICD device which I believe requires ultimate precision.  I am doing well now and back to my work as MIS Surgeon. Thank you for being the dedicated, thoughtful, compassionate, and always going above and beyond and working tirelessly to improve patient outcomes in difficult cases like mine after pocket infection of AICD Left.

Will not recommend to be treated by him. . My wife had got the stenting done by him but within 6 months she had problems and had to get the same procedure done by an another Surgeon. Reports said that the procedure followed by Dr. BALBIR was not done properly ** * ****** *** *** ***** * ****** ****** ***** ******* *** ******** ***** It was painful but everytime we consulted him  we were told it is normal but the reality was that the surgery was not successful.  After care also was not good. ******** **** **** *** ***********

We have booked an appointment with the doctor at 10: 30am and the doctor see us at 1: 30 pm. The doctor was not even trying to listen to our problem he just suggested angiography. Whosoever is reading this review please don't to go him .he is not even ready to understand your sickness and time

My mother was admitted under his care but he had no time to visit her or meet us. He and his team were utterly rude and opaque. One of his team members even told me that we are not radio channels to keep giving you update. And next day my mother was dead. She gone for only some water retention in body due to heart condition and they couldn’t manage that.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have heard about Dr Balbir Singh from many people. ** ** ** ********* ****** *** we were very relaxed once we met him for the treatment. God bless Dr Balbir Singh. We were lucky that we came to him for our treatment well in time.
He is the perfect and doctor for cardiology probleb and elctrophysiology specialist and perfect for operation which we have gone through twice under his control.  Please give his mob number.

Doctor is real hero and very good person.
And very intelligent.
I m 10 year old patient of Dr balbir singh ji
